changes.short: Added input validation to factorial function
changes.long: Enhanced the factorial function by introducing a precondition check that raises a ValueError if the input number is negative. This ensures the function handles only valid, non-negative integers, adhering to the mathematical definition of factorial.

changes.short: Added main execution block to script
changes.long: Introduced a main execution block that tests the factorial function with a sample input of 5 when the script is run directly.
